about_the_game:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the Capcom Pro Tour 2017 Premier Pass.

Includes the following content: Ryu CPT Costume, Ken CPT Costume, and special in-game titles 'Capcom Cup 2017' and 'Capcom Pro Tour 2017.” This pass also includes EX03 Colors for 28 Characters through Season 2, Guile's CPT Champion’s Choice costume and Ring of Pride stage.

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*In order to use the CPT 2017 costumes and CPT: 2017 Premier Pass EX03 colors, you will also need access to the characters.
*The EX03 colors and in-game titles are limited content only available in the CPT: 2017 Premier Pass. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.
detailed_description:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the Capcom Pro Tour 2017 Premier Pass.

Includes the following content: Ryu CPT Costume, Ken CPT Costume, and special in-game titles 'Capcom Cup 2017' and 'Capcom Pro Tour 2017.” This pass also includes EX03 Colors for 28 Characters through Season 2, Guile's CPT Champion’s Choice costume and Ring of Pride stage.

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*In order to use the CPT 2017 costumes and CPT: 2017 Premier Pass EX03 colors, you will also need access to the characters.
*The EX03 colors and in-game titles are limited content only available in the CPT: 2017 Premier Pass. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.
